Title: ModJam 2024 - Outcast Priest and Lampothy
Description:
My first submission for the Caves of Qud ModJam 2024 "Pets and Presets": "Outcast Priest and Lampothy".

Includes the "Outcast Priest" preset, and "Lampothy": a nullphase pet that illuminates it's surroundings while berating your enemies.

Enjoy

-Mephril
